Comments
September 17, 2022
tidge
I think this is one of the better Sword Objects; Shape Change is a nice extra layer of (unpredictable) defense that is not particularly common on figures with damage reducers. Plasticity is an excellent addition to figure that have move+attack and/or don't mind holding opposing figures in place. It is especially refreshing to neither have these additional powers be tied to the use of B/C/F nor have a "once per turn" restriction.
